Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 25th overall pick, by Lynchburg in 1955...
Drafted in 4th round, 86th overall pick, by Pontiac in 1967...
Injured on 8/27/1968 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for 6 days...
Injured on 4/22/1973 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 5/8/1973 with a Pulled Hip Muscle, out for 5 days...
Injured on 6/26/1973 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 5/5/1975, off Thomas Tuttle (PEN)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/18/1975, off Carl Vieira (TRO)...
Released by Pontiac on 11/3/1976...
Signed as a free agent by Halifax on 11/3/1976 to a 1-year deal worth $300,000 per year...
Released by Halifax on 4/7/1980...
Signed as a free agent by Plum Grove on 6/9/1980 to a minor league contract...
Signed as a free agent by Boston (UBA) on 2/7/1982 to a 2-year deal worth $450,000 per year...
